headline.main: The War in Russia -- I; Variance Between Soviet and Nazi Claims Heightens Mystery of 'Unknown' Conflict

lead_paragraph: Eleven days ago the Russians announced the start of their Stalingrad offensive and last Sunday they reported the opening of offensive operations on the important Rzhev front. Yesterday, the Soviet communiques continued to claim successes, though with less specific detail than hitherto.
abstract: H W Baldwin on Ger and USSR conflicting communiques
